arts.ttl: Arsenal handed huge Joan Garcia transfer boost as Espanyol chief makes admission over release clause
arts.sum: Arsenal are handed a boost in their efforts to sign Espanyol goalkeeper Joan Garcia, who could be allowed to leave the Spanish club for less than his release clause.

arts.ttl: A-Leagues boss Nick Garcia departs in shock mid-season leadership shake-up
arts.sum: Stephen Conroy tightens grip on Australian Professional Leagues APL hopes to stabilise domestic competitions take another hit A-Leagues commissioner Nick Garcia has departed his role in a shock mid-season leadership change at Australian football’s struggling domestic competitions. Garcia’s departure was confirmed on Thursday, with Australian Professional Leagues chairman Stephen Conroy announced as executive chairman. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Preview: Braga vs. Nacional - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Friday's Primeira Liga clash between Braga and Nacional, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
